txt.en: Burn the hauntreek you collected in the braziers found around Haerondir.\n\nThe hauntreek will cause the fire to burn a strange blue colour.

‘I believe I owe you an explanation, [placeholder]. Have you noticed that no Orcs lurk in the ruins near Haerondir, as they do in all the other ruins in the Noman-lands? This is no accident. We have tricked those cowards into thinking that Haerondir is haunted! One of the ways we do this is with those blue-coloured flames you attended to earlier. Let me show you another way we spook them.'

‘I hear Anborn is sending you to Nuiharn. While you're there, can you do me a favour? There is a shrub that grows amongst the ruins, silver-coloured and scraggly.  We call it hauntreek.  It is valuable to us because it glows an eerie blue colour when burned. Why do we want that? I'll explain when you return.\n\n'Gather some hauntreek for me, and burn them in the braziers around Haerondir. The colour of the flames will change before your eyes!’
Rhadrog can be found in Haerondir.\n\nYou should speak with Rhadrog.
Rhadrog has asked you to collect hauntreek from the ruins of Nuiharn, and then burn them in braziers around Haerondir.
Hauntreek can be found in the ruins of Nuiharn, north-west of Haerondir.\n\nCollect hauntreek for Rhadrog.
